title: CREAM'd To LEAVE
body_text:
If there's one thing
EastCoastDodgeball
has taught in its 38 month existence, it's that "friends make better enemies". The forthcoming 165th presentation further proves that claim when arguably the most dominant figures of the 2008 calendar year - a pair of lifelong buddies - collide head-on in an encounter with double the stipulation:
John Tronolone vs. Ryan Letsche
in a
White Flag - CREAMation
match!
How It All Came About
Before Season 16 came to a close in mid-October,
ECD's
"Rimshot King" sat down with his *wink-wink* closest ally Tronolone, hinting at the possibility of a match between the two. The self-proclaimed "Creation" instantly accepted, with both combatants eager to include a special ingredient. Tronolone's flawless 2008 record coupled with Letsche's unblemished
CREAMation
wars allowed for this soon-to-be classic mid-season showdown.
Applying the Rules
White Flag
: Tronolone's captains career is terminated forever in the event of a loss.
CREAMation
: Letsche is met with a whipped cream pie to the face if he is defeated.
Someone's gotta
leave
or someone's getting
creamed
...
This is your DODGEBALL CLX5 main event  on November 22.
Friendships Divided: Brief History
PondScum
imploded the very second they stepped into the limelight in early '06 and have yet to cease fire amongst each other.
See
DODGEBALL XXV
,
DODGEBALL LX3
,
DODGEBALL 83
,
DODGEBALL 122
Reckless warriors
Joey Smalls
and
Sascha Basista
have been in direct combat on two separate occasions.
See
DODGEBALL 65
,
DODGEBALL 74
The damn
CREAMation
encounters have brought those unbreakable bonds even closer .. literally.
See
DODGEBALL LXXXI
,
DODGEBALL 157
body_html:
If there's one thing EastCoastDodgeball has taught in its 38 month existence, it's that "friends make better enemies". The forthcoming 165th presentation further proves that claim when arguably the most dominant figures of the 2008 calendar year - a pair of lifelong buddies - collide head-on in an encounter with double the stipulation: John Tronolone vs. Ryan Letsche in a White Flag - CREAMation match!

How It All Came About
Before Season 16 came to a close in mid-October, ECD's "Rimshot King" sat down with his *wink-wink* closest ally Tronolone, hinting at the possibility of a match between the two. The self-proclaimed "Creation" instantly accepted, with both combatants eager to include a special ingredient. Tronolone's flawless 2008 record coupled with Letsche's unblemished CREAMation wars allowed for this soon-to-be classic mid-season showdown.

Applying the Rules
White Flag: Tronolone's captains career is terminated forever in the event of a loss.
CREAMation: Letsche is met with a whipped cream pie to the face if he is defeated.

Someone's gotta leave or someone's getting creamed ...
This is your DODGEBALL CLX5 main event on November 22.


Friendships Divided: Brief History
  • PondScum imploded the very second they stepped into the limelight in early '06 and have yet to cease fire amongst each other.
    See DODGEBALL XXV, DODGEBALL LX3, DODGEBALL 83, DODGEBALL 122
  • Reckless warriors Joey Smalls and Sascha Basista have been in direct combat on two separate occasions.
    See DODGEBALL 65, DODGEBALL 74
  • The damn CREAMation encounters have brought those unbreakable bonds even closer .. literally.
    See DODGEBALL LXXXI, DODGEBALL 157
